author: J. Edward Moreno
title: NJ Gov. Murphy asks DHS to extend DACA work permits amid pandemic
description: New Jersey Gov. Phil Murphy (D) on Friday asked the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) to extend work permits for beneficiaries of the Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals (DACA) program amid the coronavirus pandemic...
content:
New Jersey Gov. Phil Murphy (D) on Friday asked the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) to extend work permits for beneficiaries of the Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals (DACA) program amid the coronavirus pandemic.
